name: MEC Cold Rush Thermal Run Tights - Men's
description:
A cold snap is no reason to change your workout plans. These thermal tights keep you warm during fast-paced winter activities. The stretch fabric wicks sweat  so you stay dry, and reflectivity ensures you're seen when you run into the night.Moisture-wicking nylon, spandex moves with you for unrestricted motion.Soft brushed fleece interior adds warmth.Elastic waistband with internal drawcord provides a secure fit.2 thigh pockets (one zippered) keep your gels, keys and tunes handy.Reflective detailing keeps you visible during low-light workouts.

Body fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
